result.cause_notes: Log shows ISP was dropping/resetting the connection

result.short_description: USB port has stopped working
result.workaround: As this is intermittent. Restarting the PC fixes this.
result.cause_notes: This is a timing issue caused when you plug and unplug USB devices quickly
result.close_notes: OS and hardware vendor cannot find the root cause as it is intermittent. So they recommend restarting the PC

result.short_description: My laptop is performing very badly
result.description: A few days ago I made some modification to some Windows config, and since then my laptop is performing slowly. Is there any way to go back to a previous state?

result.short_description: The Webex application is unavailable to all employees
result.cause_notes: Server does not meet minimum specs to run the meeting server
result.fix_notes: Upgrade CPU and RAM to meet minimum specs

result.short_description: 2nd Floor File Server Short on Space
result.description: We really, really need to buy more drives for the second floor file. The users keep filling up their 10 MB quota, and they aren't going to take it much longer.

result.short_description: Can't access SFA software
result.cause_notes: Siebel SFA does not support this version of Orcale
result.description: Performance of the Siebel SFA software has been severely degraded since the upgrade performed this weekend. We moved to an unsupported Oracle DB version.
result.fix_notes: Upgrade to the latest version of Oracle

result.short_description: Unknown source of SAP outage
result.description: Several hours ago we experienced a flood of incidents related to various SAP applications. It has been determined that there is an outage of unknown origin. We are performing root cause analysis.
